G

get(Item) - Method in class entities.characters.AbstractChar
This method adds an item to the character's inventory at the end.
getBuffedStat() - Method in class items.consumables.AbstractConsumable
 
getBuffedStat() - Method in interface items.consumables.Consumable
Finds and returns the name of the buffed stat of the item.
getDmg() - Method in class items.weapons.AbstractWeapon
 
getDmg() - Method in interface items.weapons.Weapon
This method finds and returns the standalone damage value of the particular weapon.
getDuration() - Method in class items.consumables.AbstractConsumable
 
getDuration() - Method in interface items.consumables.Consumable
Finds and returns how long the items effect should last, in turns, after its use.
getMod() - Method in class items.consumables.AbstractConsumable
 
getMod() - Method in interface items.consumables.Consumable
Finds and returns the value corresponding to how much the item should add to its buffed stat.
getName() - Method in class entities.Entity
Looks for and returns the name string of the entity.
getName() - Method in class items.consumables.AbstractConsumable
 
getName() - Method in interface items.Item
This gets the name of the item and returns it.
getName() - Method in class items.weapons.AbstractWeapon
 
Goblin - Class in entities.monsters
This class of Monster is a goblin, a common enemy in many RPGs.
Goblin() - Constructor for class entities.monsters.Goblin
The base constructor of the Goblin sets the name to "goblin", HPmax to 7, HP to 7, strength to 7, defense to 3, speed to 10, and XPval to 10.
